Author: y2kcherub
Text: i love to make sweets (albeit they mostly fail) for my family because i like working with sugar and chocolate and butter and all the things i WANT to eat but can’t.  i feed the people around me to feed myself subconsciously, but i’ll always add more sugar/butter/fatty shit, so the things that i’m craving that i’m not having.  i wouldn’t eat what she brings, though. knowing she has an ED and personally i don’t count the calories of the stuff that i bake for others because it’s not important since i’m not eating any of it anyways.

Author: xxobutitoldyouso
Text: I wouldn't touch anything she makes with a 10 foot poll.  I mean, what if she is intentionally adding more calories than she is letting on.  Also, if you already told her to not mention carbs and calories around you and she doesn't respect that boundary you should really reconsider that friendship.  I've had disordered thoughts about feeding everyone around me so I don't have to feed myself, or everyone gaining weight while I get thinner, but going from that to actually do it...its just **wrong**.
